Package ooga.model.components

Class GamePiece

java.lang.Object
ooga.model.components.GamePiece
public class GamePiece
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a generic game piece. Has a location, the board it is on, and a list of possible moves

  • Constructor Details

    • GamePiece

      public GamePiece​(Coordinate pieceCoordinates, java.lang.String pieceName, java.lang.String pieceTeam)
      Makes the piece and passes all the information it needs to be able to move
      Parameters:
      pieceCoordinates - The coordinates of the piece, represented by a coordinate object
      pieceName - The name of the piece
      pieceTeam - The team that the piece is on

  • Method Details

    • determineAllLegalMoves

      public java.util.Set<Coordinate> determineAllLegalMoves()
      Gets a list of all the coordinates that represent legal moves. Also creates the legalMovementMap used to retrieve the correct movement object when a set of coordinates is used to move a piece
      Returns:
      A list of the coordinates of the legal moves

    • determineAllLegalTakeMoves

      public java.util.Set<Coordinate> determineAllLegalTakeMoves()
      This method determines all the legal moves which take a GamePiece
      Returns:
      a Set<Coordinate> of all the legal moves which take a GamePiece

    • determineAllPossibleRestrictionlessTakeMoves

      public java.util.Set<Coordinate> determineAllPossibleRestrictionlessTakeMoves()
      This method returns a Set<Coordinate> of all the possible take moves which don't have an associated restriction.
      Returns:
      a Set<Coordinate> of all the possible take moves which don't have an associated Restriction

    • hasTakeMove

      public boolean hasTakeMove()
      Returns whether or not the specific GamePiece can take other GamePieces
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing whether or not this GamePiece has possible moves which can take another GamePiece

    • executeMove

      public void executeMove​(Coordinate finalCoordinates)
      When given the final coordinates of a move, this move is executed
      Parameters:
      finalCoordinates - The final coordinates of the move

    • getLocationHistory

      public java.util.List<Coordinate> getLocationHistory()
      Gets all the coordinates that the piece has visited, including the one the piece is currently on
      Returns:
      A list of all the coordinates the piece has visited

    • hasMoved

      public boolean hasMoved()
      Returns whether the piece has moved or not
      Returns:
      True if it has, false if it hasn't

    • setPossibleMoves

      public void setPossibleMoves​(java.util.List<PieceMovement> allPossibleMoves)
      Sets the piece's possible moves
      Parameters:
      allPossibleMoves - A list of PieceMovement objects that represent the possible moves

    • getPieceCoordinates

      public Coordinate getPieceCoordinates()
      Returns the piece's Coordinates
      Returns:
      A Coordinate which can be used to map this GamePiece on the GameBoard

    • setPieceCoordinates

      public void setPieceCoordinates​(Coordinate newCoordinates)
      Sets this piece's Coordinates to the new, given Coordinates
      Parameters:
      newCoordinates - the new Coordinates for this piece to be moved to

    • setPieceTeam

      public void setPieceTeam​(java.lang.String team)
      Sets the team that a piece is a part of
      Parameters:
      team - The name of the team (or name of the player)

    • getPieceTeam

      public java.lang.String getPieceTeam()
      Gets the team that a piece is a part of
      Returns:
      the name of the team (or name of the player)

    • getPieceName

      public java.lang.String getPieceName()
      Gets the name of the piece
      Returns:
      The name of the piece
